Blog.post: Did anyone notice my name changing? 6th grade, I was Philip, some called me Phil. 7th grade, I was Phil, few called me Philip. 8th, I was Pip, some called me Phil, some called me Philip. Hell, most People can't spell my name right.. Oh yeah, you can't forget Stacey calling me Philly Cheesesteak. And Anthony called me Philly. And Mr. Porte called me..sigh.. Pillip. Because he said "I was hard to swallow"..

You know, as I was doing about my day, I finally realize, what if.. What if I don't see some of my friends next year? What if theres too much homework? What if my freshman year is hell? I don't wanna leave you guys... I'm not worried about those other what ifs, because it'll just be like starting middle school again, except with us more mature, and older. But I'm depressed, now. Yeah, I get depressed whenever. But I can't stop the inevitable. I remember in 6th grade.. Now in 6th grade, first "new" person I met was, believe it or not, Yong Xiao. He tells me stupid shit that nobody cares about.. but, oh well. I was nice, and pretended I listened. Heh, I remember Doug in homeroom (Rios). He'd always ask me what book I was reading. So in Malloy, we had to do that island thing right? Oy, I can't remember what Jenna and Taylor did, but it pissed me off. Sixth grade, I grew up on them. I was attached. Gemmy, Laura, Karyn, Andres, Melinda, Michelle, Shela, Ariel, Richard, Jenna, Taylor, Kim, Katie, Scott, Marissa, James, Robin, Ricky, Roslnn, Lindsey, Anthony, Jameer, Eric, Eric Ca., Gabriel, and the like. Last day of school, I remember Marissa proposing to leave to persue her career in music. Hmph, we were all sad, but happy for her. I remember filming all those videos. KLAP, anyone? Anthony and his tennis skills.. I remember Armando swinging a chain, and Mrs. Kamplain getting pissed. I remember those rockets in science, and those rollercoasters. We did so much in 6th grade Sci. Mr. Ohlman is my favorite compared to Mr. Mar and Mrs. Miki. At least I can get a A. I remember at the awards ceremony, Mrs. Malloy let me hold her baby, Dylan, while she went to get something. I remember our field trips, to that Archaelogical site, and that Mission spacey whatchamacallit. I remember afterschool thursdays, I'd stay with the bus people. Breon would always mess with me somehow. I remember when Ariel and Jenna and me had a 3-point shootout. And Jenna won. I remember in P.E. where Mr. Tokeshi would talk and talk and talk. I remember when Ricky asked me to be his partner and I said "No." I remember Anthony always going "Philly!" I remember constantly asking Kent what his name was. I swear, I thought it was Ken. I remember Jeffery Aronhalt and his obsession with Annalaura, or was it.. I remember Isaac running around yelling "Dildo" and "Penis". I remember when we did that Elective wheel. I remember how long those cafeteria lines were. I remember when I got a perfect on the fractions test. I remember when Mrs. Malloy crowned me SotM. I remember a lot more, but I won't waste no more of my time or yours.. To all those people that took the fork in the road, thank you for all the memories. I wonder what it would've been like to have you people til' graduation. I'mma write Part II: 7th Grade, One of the best years of my life, later. Peace (-.-)
urlLink Sorry if this grossed you out.. But, I got bored, so I took pictures of inside my mouth..

Ever notice how I usually post at 11-ish? Meh, that's just me.. Anyways, woke up at ate noodles at what's that place, Binh Doung? Then, went shopping some. I got some manga for my brother, and me some clothes, and a new backpack! At least I like it better than my red one.. Well, I'm out.
I found this kinda entertaining.. Thanks Daniel! P Plain H Healthy I Irresistible L Luxurious I Industrious P Philosophical Name / Username: urlLink Name Acronym Generator From urlLink Go-Quiz.com

Well, today was fun. First, woke up at ten. Got ready, watched "The Menu", damn that show is stupid.. Anyways, at like 11:30, I left to go look for Mayfair Park. Found it, but I couldn't find Andrew and friends.. So I called, and this "old lady" answered, but it was Daniel. I was scared. So anyways, I met up with D and A, and we waited. Yeah, we mostly ate Daniel's fried rice and played tennis, but oh well. Heng wanted to play basketball, so I went. I kinda regret it... Because this OLD mexican dude grabbed us and FORCED us to play. Argh, I didn't try. So then went back, played tennis, the got thirsty. So we headed over to Mickey D's. Yeah. To make it short, it ended up me and Daniel last to leave. Dan, hehe, was worried about the fried rice (which he had to heat at home, not the one he brought.) Sorry! Yeah, so after I dropped off Daniel, my Dad went off to Anaheim Lake. Stayed for like six hours and only caught ONE fish. Oh well, that was our best so far! Heh. So now it's eleven o. I wanna watch Mad TV.. so I'm gonna finish this off. Oh, and FYI, the picnic group was, Andrew, Daniel, Roslynn, Kent, Lorreane, Heng, Chong, Lindsey, Daniel's girl (Christina?), Sorry if I forgot anyone.. I'll post pics of the picnic later. Bye!
Man Rebakon. What was that, like 10+ songs?! My jaw is sore now from all that laughing... Heh.. four posts.. you're never gonna see that again..
Hello everybody. I felt like choosing some pics from June 9th. Ya know, the picnic? There are more, but I'm lazy.. Enjoy! Click to enlarge. urlLink urlLink urlLink urlLink urlLink urlLink urlLink

Hello. See how far apart my posts are? Yeahh.. So anyways, Mellock and Laura drew pictures of me that I found funny. Especially Mellock's with the rundays.. "I can't run 'cause you're making me laugh!" Oh..good times. Anyways, Have fun. Oh, and Laura, I kinda forgot where I saved that drawing you made of us, so.. mind sending it to me again? Click to see larger image. urlLink urlLink

Man, I start another blog. Lets see how long this'll last. Other one was like two days, I expect this to last three! Oh well, I'm no good at these journal thingies. I'm gonna forget someday.. edit: oh yeah, anyone can post comments, you don't have to register or anything.

So I was browsing through that old website of mine "Phil's Ultrapage". Hah, what a gay name. So I remember people that would email, and they actually offered to *pay* me to make buddy icons. I never made them. Hah! So then, I browsed through the guestbook. Turns out some sick fuck posted this: Name: urlLink Make Money Web Site: The Only Work From Home Program That Teaches You From: How To Make Money With Turnkey Adult Websites Referred By: The Secret to Success: SEX SELLS! Date: Wed Apr 7 15:26:22 MDT 2004 Question: Who is making the most money online today? Answer: Companies and individuals that operate their own adult web sites. Do you want to make more money? The internet is the best place to sell porn because your customers may remain anonymous. They can browse through images and movies and simply turn off their computer when they are done. The fact is that it's easy to own and operate an adult web site. For just a few dollars, you can have a site of your own and start earning a great income! They're trying to convert me from selling buddy icons to selling porn! ...Hey, not a bad idea!

I was digging up some old stuff (2 months!) in my hard drive. In these days to come, I will post up stuff you people might like. I'll start off with a video of *dreamy* Mellock *dreamy* trying to hit a pinata. Click to download. YOU WILL NEED DIVX! http://www.divx.com/divx/download/ urlLink

So here I am, filling out these damn emergency cards. And I'm really bored. I hate my blog. I want to add a new template, but I'm too lazy. Sure, I start designing it, but hen I quit because I have no inspiration. So, lets have a major overhaul of these pancakes. Who wants to join my blog?! I will gladly accept more members! Damn, I forgot what else I was gonna say. BTW, I changed the comments. Now it's not that complicated. No sign up or anything. Just comment. P.S. I have a big urge to obsess over something. Or someone. GIVE ME IDEAS!

Did you know you can comment anonymously? I'm such a comment whore... Oh yeah, if you wanted to know, I did make a Xanga... http://www.xanga.com/philipros I'll switch if you guys comment "enough". Heh.

Yesterday was fun, I guess. So my family, and my dad's friends family decides to go to Catalina. So off we went. I wake up at 7, shower, brush my teeth, all that shit. We left to the port at oh, 9? We got out tickets for the 10:00 ferry, so we had about 30 minutes left. I figure, why not use my iPod! Then I look up, and I sees this person that looked like Alexopoulos. Maybe it was, but he walked away too fast. So we leave on the ferry, fun at first (I LOVE FERRIES!), then boring later (I HATE FERRIES!). First, when we got there, we did my favoritest thing.. urlLink urlLink Drive around in the golf carts!! urlLink Then enjoyed the scenery.. urlLink Then went shopping at Vons! urlLink urlLink Then ate..at Coyote Joe's by the way. I didn't like it. urlLink Then went shopping at Von's Express ! Went swimming, but I have no pictures. ;-) urlLink Went to the Casino, see how bored I look? We couldn't stay at a hotel or stuff, because they were booked out, and my parents only had Monday off. So eventually, we had to go home. urlLink Waiting for our Ferry! urlLink These things make big splashes... urlLink When the trip was over, we realized we took the wrong ferry, so we ended up at the Queen Mary. urlLink So we take the bus! I am "happy" on the bus! (Pretend I'm the backpack!) urlLink But we take the wrong bus, too. And we end up at The Pike! Well, we do end up getting home. And I have a really bad headache and stomachache. Shitting doesn't do me that good, by the way. I would've bought you and me some souvenirs, but one problem: I have no money. So I had a nice day. How about you?
Has anybody noticed that I added a chatterbox? Sigh.
urlLink http://illustmaker.abi-station.com/index_en.shtml That place is fun. I made me this self portrait! eh? eh?

Well, I found my iPod. Actually, my brother found it. In a fold-in cupholder.. Hmm.. never thought of looking in there as I NEVER USE IT. I wonder who put my little baby there... Anyways, glad that its back and this is all over now. Man, all that adrenaline and despair can't be good. On another note, I got this free DVD in the mail: 7th Street. Its some documentary about the evolution of Manhattan.. Seems interesting. Don't forget to comment!
I lost love my iPod.

I actually ran out of titles! I'm not as witty as I once was... Why does nobody comment?!! So.. I finally decide to buy a Gameboy Advance SP. Heh, my luck is so shitty. My first one had a dead pixel.. so I got back to CC and get a new one! Lucky me, that one has a dead pixel, too! So, tomorrow, I go back, and I get a new one. Fun, fun exchanges. Gah, I'm so anal about these things. I can't stand imperfectons!! Ironic, since I'm so imperfect. Oh well. I babysitted again. I hope your day was shittier than mine. Just kidding! Oh yes, I'm going to sign up for a Xanga. I might move, most probably not, because I think it has a shitty interface. Persuade me. C'MON! BTW: I took one of those test thingies, ya'know the one about your favorite cuss word. Mine turned out to be shit . That was the best moment of my life ;_;

12 hour battery? Through the firmware? Basically... it's just a 3G iPod with a mini clickwheel. There is no new battery. Just "better power management." So 3G iPods could technically have 12 hour battery life... It's just Apple doesn't want us to. BTW... I think its fucking ugly.. c'mon what's with the grey wheel?
My pose didn't come out right. BTW, webcams suck for pics.

I read that one post, "Here Comes the Pain" and it made me think... Damn I'm a pussy. SO ANYWAYS... My comp is broken, I have to wait a MONTH to get it back. Ugh, well.. meh, I kinda like my brother's computer better... So lemme tell you some of my dreams... This one dream, I was at this grocery store, then the police run in and they're chasing this old lady. So she stops near the lettuce and takes out a gun.. THEN this dude that looks like George Huff on Sherbert's body come in and start laughing at the lady. The lady shoots him down, while the police stand right next to me just staring... So then, the lady starts rushing at us and the police run out. Next thing I know, I was running with Mike... I look down my shirt, and I see 5 pinkish holes, no blood. Funny because one was directly on my nipple.. So I ask Mike, did you get shot too? And he tells me he got shot 9 times. NINE?! Anyways, it ended there. Yeah, just a dream... doesn't fit together much though...

Hi mellody!!

I feel hyper. Maybe it's the fact I'm using Linux. Maybe it's the fact I haven't started my summer reading yet. (I will, you just watch!) But anyways, just dropped in to say hi. Hi! Oh yeah, ducar made me mod on his forums. something tells me it won't last long. it isn't the first time someone has tried this. remember, sumner? anyways, sumner was ad-filled. pop a skin on this and its okay. urlLink http://frikydesigns.com/phpBB/index.php dont make me a loner now!!

Today, I was bored had the time of my life! So, I decide to get little emoticons!! Today, I have 3. I will rate them also!! 1. Hah! I love this one! It lets me make my statements even more cornier!! How !!! Uh...3/5 2. Hehehe. Eh? Eh? ...2/5 3. Did you know they make emoticons of Yong Xiao? Here's proof: HAHHAHAHA. Example: Hey Baby hmm...4.7/5 bye people.
The other daughter. iono, i started thinking about michelle. ;-)
